channel.title: Carotenoid on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Carotenoid on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnaA01.ABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnaA01.ABF3 Gene Name: ABA-responsive element–binding factor 3 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Molecular and transgenic experiments demonstrated that each BnaZEP pair is transcriptionally regulated via ABA-responsive element–binding factor 3s (BnaABF3s) and BnaMYB44s as common and specific regulators, respectively.

item.title: BnaA07.MYB44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaA07g11930D Gene Symbol: BnaA07.MYB44 Gene Name: MYB44 transcription factor Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaMYB44s specifically targeted and repressed the expression of BnaA09.

item.title: BnaA07.ZEP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnaA07.ZEP Gene Name: Zeaxanthin epoxidase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The functional divergence of the gene pairs BnaA09.

item.title: BnaC01.ABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC01g04330D Gene Symbol: BnaC01.ABF3 Gene Name: ABA-responsive element–binding factor 3 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Molecular and transgenic experiments demonstrated that each BnaZEP pair is transcriptionally regulated via ABA-responsive element–binding factor 3s (BnaABF3s) and BnaMYB44s as common and specific regulators, respectively.

item.title: BnaC07.ABF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC07g44670D Gene Symbol: BnaC07.ABF3 Gene Name: ABA-responsive element–binding factor 3 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: Molecular and transgenic experiments demonstrated that each BnaZEP pair is transcriptionally regulated via ABA-responsive element–binding factor 3s (BnaABF3s) and BnaMYB44s as common and specific regulators, respectively.

item.title: BnaC07.MYB44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: BnaC07g16030D Gene Symbol: BnaC07.MYB44 Gene Name: MYB44 transcription factor Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaMYB44s specifically targeted and repressed the expression of BnaA09.

item.title: BnaC07.ZEP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnaC07.ZEP Gene Name: Zeaxanthin epoxidase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: The functional divergence of the gene pairs BnaA09.

item.title: CmCCD4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCCD4a Gene Name: Carotenoid Cleavage Dioxygenase4 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: Carotenoid Cleavage Dioxygenase (CmCCD4a) Contributes to White Color Formation in Chrysanthemum Petals.

item.title: CmCCD4a-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmCCD4a-2 Gene Name: Carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor complex CmAP3-CmPI-CmUIF1 modulates carotenoid metabolism by directly regulating the carotenogenic gene CmCCD4a-2 in chrysanthemum.

item.title: CmDXS2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C017499 Gene Symbol: CmDXS2a Gene Name: 1-deoxyxylulose 5-phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In the case of DXS, three genes encode functional DXS activities which fall into previously established type I (CmDXS1) and II (CmDXS2a and CmDXS2b) categories, while a fourth DXS-like gene belonging to the type III group did not encode a protein with DXS activity.

item.title: CmDXS2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C014965 Gene Symbol: CmDXS2b Gene Name: 1-deoxyxylulose 5-phosphate synthase Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: In the case of DXS, three genes encode functional DXS activities which fall into previously established type I (CmDXS1) and II (CmDXS2a and CmDXS2b) categories, while a fourth DXS-like gene belonging to the type III group did not encode a protein with DXS activity.

item.title: CmFBN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C007423 Gene Symbol: CmFBN1 Gene Name: FIBRILLIN1 Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Carotenoid sequestration protein FIBRILLIN (CmFBN1) participates in CmOR-regulated β-carotene accumulation in melon.

item.title: CmOR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmOR Gene Name: Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: Carotenoid sequestration protein FIBRILLIN participates in CmOR-regulated β-carotene accumulation in melon.

item.title: CmPPR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MELO3C003069–70 Gene Symbol: CmPPR1 Gene Name: white-flesh Genome: Species: Cucumis melo Functional Descriptions: QTL analysis of flesh color intensity identified a candidate white-flesh gene (CmPPR1), one of two major loci determining fruit flesh color in melon.

item.title: CpbHLH1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: evm.model.supercontig_131.7 Gene Symbol: CpbHLH1 Gene Name: Genome: papaya genomic DNA (ftp://ftp.

item.title: CpbHLH2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: evm.model.supercontig_8.253 Gene Symbol: CpbHLH2 Gene Name: Genome: papaya genomic DNA (ftp://ftp.

item.title: CrWRKY42
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CrWRKY42 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 42 Genome: Species: Citrus clementina Functional Descriptions: Transcription factor CrWRKY42 coregulates chlorophyll degradation and carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsERF061
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF061 Gene Name: group I ethylene response factor 61 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: Ethylene activation of carotenoid biosynthesis by a novel transcription factor CsERF061.

item.title: CsERF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsERF2 Gene Name: ethylene response factor 2 Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsERF2, an ethylene response factor, plays a role in leaf variegation.

item.title: CsMADS5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsMADS5 Gene Name: FRUITFULL sub-clade MADS 5 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A fruit ripening-associated transcription factor CsMADS5 positively regulates carotenoid biosynthesis in citrus.

item.title: CsPHL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs2g01480.1 Gene Symbol: CsPHL3 Gene Name: Citrus Phosphate Starvation Response Factor 3 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsPHL3 could directly represses the expression of PSY, thus resulting in a reduction of carotenoid contents, which may release less amounts of SLs and ultimately suppress Pi signaling.

item.title: CsPHT4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs6g07670 Gene Symbol: CsPHT4|2 Gene Name: plastid-type phosphate transporter 4|2 Genome: citrus genome database (http://citrus.

item.title: CsSGRa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs5g10040 Gene Symbol: CsSGRa Gene Name: STAY-GREEN Genome: C.

item.title: CsSGRb
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g20450 Gene Symbol: CsSGRb Gene Name: STAY-GREEN Genome: C.

item.title: CsULT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsULT1 Gene Name: ultrapetala transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Identification, cloning and characterization of an ultrapetala transcription factor CsULT1 from Crocus: a novel regulator of apocarotenoid biosynthesis.

item.title: Csβ-LCY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Csβ-LCY1 Gene Name: beta-cyclase1 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The β-cyclization of lycopene, catalysed by the lycopene β-cyclases (β-LCY), seems to be a key regulatory step of the carotenoid pathway.

item.title: Csβ-LCY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Csβ-LCY2 Gene Name: beta-cyclase2 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: The β-cyclization of lycopene, catalysed by the lycopene β-cyclases (β-LCY), seems to be a key regulatory step of the carotenoid pathway.

item.title: DcCCD4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: DCAR_030904 Gene Symbol: DcCCD4 Gene Name: Carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 4 Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: DcCCD4 catalyzes the degradation of α-carotene and β-carotene to affect carotenoid accumulation and taproot color in carrot.

item.title: DcPAR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: DcPAR1 Gene Name: PHYTOCHROME RAPIDLY REGULATED1 Genome: Species: Daucus carota Functional Descriptions: Development and carotenoid synthesis in dark-grown carrot taproots require PHYTOCHROME RAPIDLY REGULATED1 (DcPAR1).

item.title: FcrNAC22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FcrNAC22 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Fortunella crassifolia Functional Descriptions: Red light-induced kumquat fruit coloration is attributable to increased carotenoid metabolism regulated by FcrNAC22.

item.title: IbNAC29
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: itf01g25900.t1 Gene Symbol: IbNAC29 Gene Name: Genome: Sweet Potato Genomics Resource database (http://sweetpotato.

item.title: LeCCD1A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeCCD1A Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1A Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1 genes contribute to the formation of the flavor volatiles β-ionone, pseudoionone, and geranylacetone.

item.title: LeCCD1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeCCD1B Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1B Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1 genes contribute to the formation of the flavor volatiles β-ionone, pseudoionone, and geranylacetone.

item.title: LeNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LeNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxy-carotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: LjCCD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: LjSGA_131670.1 Gene Symbol: LjCCD7 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 Genome: Species: Lotus japonicus Functional Descriptions: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE 7 modulates plant growth, reproduction, senescence, and determinate nodulation in the model legume Lotus japonicus.

item.title: Lpx-B1.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Lpx-B1.1 Gene Name: lipoxygenase1 Genome: Species: Triticum turgidum Functional Descriptions: Insight into durum wheat Lpx-B1: a small gene family coding for the lipoxygenase responsible for carotenoid bleaching in mature grains.

item.title: Lpx-B1.2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: Lpx-B1.2 Gene Name: lipoxygenase1 Genome: Species: Triticum turgidum Functional Descriptions: Insight into durum wheat Lpx-B1: a small gene family coding for the lipoxygenase responsible for carotenoid bleaching in mature grains.

item.title: MdMYBS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD00G1169600 Gene Symbol: MdMYBS1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid activates transcription factor module MdABI5–MdMYBS1 during carotenoid-derived apple fruit coloration.

item.title: MdPSY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000177623 Gene Symbol: MdPSY1 Gene Name: phytoene synthase1 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The first committed carotenoid pathway step in apple is controlled by MdPSY1 and MdPSY2, while MdPSY4 play little or no role in this respect.

item.title: MdPSY2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MDP0000237124 Gene Symbol: MdPSY2 Gene Name: phytoene synthase2 Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: The first committed carotenoid pathway step in apple is controlled by MdPSY1 and MdPSY2, while MdPSY4 play little or no role in this respect.

item.title: MtCCD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MtCCD1 Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1 Genome: Species: Medicago truncatula Functional Descriptions: RNA Interference-Mediated Repression of MtCCD1 in Mycorrhizal Roots of Medicago truncatula Causes Accumulation of C27 Apocarotenoids, Shedding Light on the Functional Role of CCD1.

item.title: OfCCD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: OfCCD1 Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase 1 Genome: Species: Osmanthus fragrans Functional Descriptions: A cDNA encoding a carotenoid cleavage enzyme, OfCCD1, was identified from transcripts isolated from flowers of O.

item.title: pyp1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc01g098110 Gene Symbol: pyp1 Gene Name: PALE YELLOW PETAL 1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Identification of the carotenoid modifying gene PALE YELLOW PETAL 1 as an essential factor in xanthophyll esterification and yellow flower pigmentation in tomato.

item.title: SlAP2a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlAP2a Gene Name: APETALA2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: A tomato (Solanum lycopersicum) APETALA2/ERF gene, SlAP2a, is a negative regulator of fruit ripening.

item.title: SlAP2c
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc02g093150 Gene Symbol: SlAP2c Gene Name: APETALA2 transcription factor Genome: ITAG4.

item.title: SlbHLH22
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g097820 Gene Symbol: SlbHLH22 Gene Name: basic helix-loop-helix 12 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a basic helix–loop–helix transcription factor gene, SlbHLH22, promotes early flowering and accelerates fruit ripening in tomato.

item.title: SlCCD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCCD8 Gene Name: CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The tomato CAROTENOID CLEAVAGE DIOXYGENASE8 (SlCCD8) regulates rhizosphere signaling, plant architecture and affects reproductive development through strigolactone biosynthesis.

item.title: SlCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlCYP707A1 Gene Name: Abscisic acid 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Abscisic acid levels in tomato ovaries are regulated by LeNCED1 and SlCYP707A1.

item.title: SlJMJ3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g005240 Gene Symbol: SlJMJ3 Gene Name: jumonji domain–containing demethylase3 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Histone H3K27 demethylase SlJMJ3 modulates fruit ripening in tomato.

item.title: SlNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor1 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of tomato SlNAC1transcription factor alters fruit pigmentation and softening.

item.title: SlNCED1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlNCED1 Gene Name: 9-cis-epoxycarotenoid dioxygenase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: SlNCED1 and SlCYP707A2: key genes involved in ABA metabolism during tomato fruit ripening.

item.title: SlPSY1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc03g031860 Gene Symbol: SlPSY1 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: SlSGR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc08g080090 Gene Symbol: SlSGR1 Gene Name: Stay-Green 1 Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: TaCRTISO-1B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS1B02G090300 Gene Symbol: TaCRTISO-1B Gene Name: CAROTENOID ISOMERASE-1B Genome: Chinese_Spring1.

item.title: VvCCD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvCCD1 Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase1 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: A Carotenoid Cleavage Dioxygenase from Vitis vinifera L.

item.title: WRKY32
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07g005650 Gene Symbol: WRKY32 Gene Name: WRKY transcription factor 32 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor WRKY32 affects tomato fruit colour by regulating YELLOW FRUITED-TOMATO 1, a core component of ethylene signal transduction.

item.title: ZmCCD7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb074640 Gene Symbol: ZmCCD7 Gene Name: carotenoid cleavage dioxygenase7 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: ZmcrtRB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb073250 Gene Symbol: ZmcrtRB3|hyd4 Gene Name: hydroxylase4 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
